about_the_game:
Background music collection【Digital Edition】
When the note drops, would you recognize who you’re battling with in the castle?
The darkness in the castle, scorching lava of the ruin and the intense battle with Tania……
Different part of adventure decorated with soundtracks with rich atmospheres makes an engaging audio experience.

Little Witch Nobeta - background music collection【Digital Edition】
Contain 15 soundtracks from
Sound design and soundtrack composed by local renowned composer and recorded by Budapest Scoring.
All bosses from Vanessa onward are paired with movie standard symphony soundtrack.
An exquisite musical journey to enhance your experience in the exploration of the ancient castle & combat with enemies.

Background music collection【Digital Edition】specification: mp3 & wav
Soundtracks: 15 background music from the game (Approximately 44 minutes in length)
